description:
Are you struggling to learn Statistics and Probability?

Are you appearing in any certification exam such as ASQ-CQA, CQE, CMQ/OE, CRE etc and want to refresh your understanding of basic statistics?

Get this free online course now.

Topics included:

Understanding what the statistics is. We will then try to understand the types or levels of data. What you can do with the type of data you have.

Descriptive statistics topics include the concepts and calculations of mean, mode, median, range and standard deviation.

Introduction to probability and probability laws are explained.
title: Statistics and Probability - Basics
